body_html:
For now i made such build env for zero_out https://github.com/shkarupa-alex/zero
It based on https://github.com/tensorflow/lattice (the only working tensorflow + custom ops + bazel repo i found).
There were a lot of challenges. For example TF r1.9.0 could not be built on fresh MacOs. So repo using TF r1.8.0 but working well with binary TF 1.9 installation.

Good news: with my repo i built op, built wheel and tested it through test.pypi.org
And it's work!

Ban news: i'm not sure about optimal .bazel.rc options and most dependencies with bazel targets because built .so library has size about 6MB. For comparison same .so built with gcc is about 100Kb

body:
For now i made such build env for zero_out https://github.com/shkarupa-alex/zero
It based on https://github.com/tensorflow/lattice (the only working tensorflow + custom ops + bazel repo i found).
There were a lot of challenges. For example TF r1.9.0 could not be built on fresh MacOs. So repo using TF r1.8.0 but working well with binary TF 1.9 installation.

Good news: with my repo i built op, built wheel and tested it through test.pypi.org
And it's work!

Ban news: i'm not sure about optimal .bazel.rc options and most dependencies with bazel targets because built .so library has size about 6MB. For comparison same .so built with gcc is about 100Kb
